resources.string: SEBACIA APP is a medical application that allows you to determine acne severity on your own without consulting a doctor. Doing so allows you to get in touch with medical professionals who will be willing to treat your particular type of acne. You can use this application to track you acne over time. If you decide to consult a professional, you can use this app to help you locate one nearby. Being a medical application you are also protected under HIPPA and any other medical laws that pertain to the country that you live in.

Sebacia, Inc. is a clinical-stage private medical device company dedicated to creating new light-based therapies for the treatment of dermatological conditions. Founded as part of The Innovation Factory, SEBACIA seeks to provide an alternative to the topical and systemic drugs currently available for the treatment of acne.

This is a survey to help you diagnose your acne. You will be shown a sequence of six levels of acne, ranging from 1-6. If your acne is less severe than the acne presented in the picture, click your selfie. If it is more severe, then click the acne level picture.
The survey has diagnosed you acne as:
Based on your history of acne we recommend blah blah blah.

HIPAA Privacy Authorization Form
 **Authorization for Use or Disclosure of Protected Health Information (Required by the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, 45 C.F.R. Parts 160 and 164)**

I authorize Sebacia to use and disclose the protected health information described below.

This authorization for release of information covers the period of healthcare from: all past, present, and future periods or until treatment ends.

**3. Extent of Authorization**
 I authorize the release of my health record with Sebacia (including treatment photos, treatment data).

4. This medical information may be used by the person I authorize to receive this information for medical treatment or consultation, billing or claims payment, or other purposes as I may direct. 
 5. This authorization shall be inforce and effect until treatment ends, at which time this authorization expires.
 6. I understand that I have the right to revoke this authorization, in writing, 
 at any time. I understand that a revocation is not effective to the extent that any person or entity has already acted in reliance on my authorization or if my authorization was obtained as a condition of obtaining insurance coverage and the insurer has a legal right to contest a claim. 
 7. I understand that my treatment, payment, enrollment, or eligibility for benefits will not be conditioned on whether I sign this authorization. 
 8. I understand that information used or disclosed pursuant to this authorization may be disclosed by the recipient and may no longer be protected by federal or state law.
 By choosing accept you agree to all terms listed in the Privacy Statement.
